snippet: The big question that now hangs over the company is whether the adjustments will satisfy the shareholders who had voiced their concerns over the plan.
abstract: Coca-Cola announces changes to executive compensation plan after facing sharp shareholder criticism.
lead_paragraph: The big question that now hangs over the company is whether the adjustments will satisfy the shareholders who had voiced their concerns over the plan.

headline.main: Coca-Cola, Yielding to Criticism, Revises Its Proposal for Executive Pay
headline.print_headline: Coca-Cola, Yielding to Criticism, Revises Its Proposal for Executive Pay
